item.description:
The folks at EMS have reopened a bigger, better version of their store in Manchester.  With all the new floor space, they have a larger shoe department.  We will meet to have their shoe gurus fit you for the perfect hiking boot that will fit your needs.

EMS will offer a 20% discount on boots and accessories purchased that evening.  You may be in the market to upgrade the hiking boots you have been using or maybe you are getting serious and using sneakers out on the trail is not working any more.  Either way, this is a great opportunity try different style and choose the one that is the best for you.  

We are meeting as a group and staying together as EMS is creating this event for our hiking group exculsively.  Meet in the shoe department, but you might want to arrive earlier to check out all the great sporting stuff.
item.how_to_find_us: Plaza at Buckland Hills, near Pet Smart

group.name: The Hartford Area Hiking™ Meetup Group

item.name: New Hiking Boot Fitting, EMS Manchester CT
